data.description: Basic HTTP authentication in Dancer web apps
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Namespace choice: There are already a few modules in the
    Dancer::Plugin::Auth namespace, so this one belongs there as well.

    Uniqueness of approach: It's possible to implement HTTP
    authentication in a Dancer web app using other modules, but this one
    makes it dead simple.

    Why this module should be listed: Due to its potential usefulness.
